alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; Eastern Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 23 at 4:37AM MDT until October 24 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 possible. * WHERE...In Colorado, Grand Valley and Debeque to Silt Corridor. In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin and Arches/Grand Flat. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; Eastern Uinta Basin
